description: Client-side script for UI interactions including popovers, quote animations, and tab switching in a TodoMVC project.
external_files: jQuery library (implied by usage of $ and $.fn)

classes.name: AppTabs
classes.description: Handles tab switching and animation for the application interface.

methods.name: persistantPopover
methods.description: Creates a persistent popover on elements with class 'applist a'.

methods.name: Quotes.build
methods.description: Builds quote HTML from an array of quote objects using a template.

methods.name: Quotes.random
methods.description: Returns a function that generates random, non-repeating quote indices.

methods.name: Quotes.animate
methods.description: Animates quote elements with fade in/out effects.

methods.name: Quotes.init
methods.description: Initializes quote display and starts animation.

methods.name: AppTabs.prototype.onSelect
methods.description: Handles tab selection and displays the corresponding content.
